hanzi-su-wiki:
薦

Значения

Рекомендовать, советовать

Мнемоника

Внизу — единорог, гибрид коня 馬 и оленя 鹿. В целом — сорт травы 艹, которую, якобы, ест это почитаемое животное, а, поэтому, рекомендованный для использования.

Варианты

荐
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiàn
to recommend; to offer sacrifice (arch.); grass; straw mat
рекомендовать; принести жертву (арх.); трава; соломенный коврик
rtega_mnemonic:
薦薦RS
荐荐		offer, present, recommend
  • an elk 廌 in a park being offered grass 艹 by visitors
  • ⓢ talent 存 makes present from grass 艹 to be offered
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 荐)
Pictophonetic: 廌 indicates the sound; 艹 (perennial grass) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 廌 [ zhì ] unicorn
heisig_chinese_memo: Picture an ad in which Uncle Jimbo recommends the latest craze in deer hunting: a high tech slingshot! The ad begins with Bambi prancing around, smelling the flowers. Then, all of a sudden, Bambi is brutally murdered with the slingshot, put on the cooking fire, and the camera pans to Uncle Jimbo happily munching on crispy cooked Bambi!
heisig_constituent: recommend, flowers, deer, cave, antlers, slingshot, catapult, tail feathers
heisig_story: Flowers . . . deer . . . one . . . tail feathers. Note the doubling up in these last two elements as in frame 2091.
koohiiStory1: Customer in restaurant asks you (waiter) what you recommend: "I recommend ze deer or ze 'eadless chicken. And I recommend you garnish it wiz some flowers." (let last six strokes = headless chicken).
koohiiStory2: It is recommended that deers stick to eating flowers. If they try to eat birds, they may end up choking on them, like this one here. Note that the head (白) is gone and the visible part of the body which is normally written with a stroke of the head must by necessity be drawn with a stroke of the tail.
WaniKani_Radicals: 艹, 广, 覀, 鳥
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You want some flowers to put on the canopy above your helicopter to keep the birds away, so you ask people what they would recommend.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You've bought flowers before, but you really don't know which ones would work best to stop birds from landing on the canopy and pooping on your helicopter.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You ask for a recommendation from the centaur (せん) that owns the local flower shop. Now he's walking around your helicopter canopy and staring at the birds, nodding.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: I hope the centaur recommends a cheap flower... but with your luck flowers that keep birds away will cost a fortune.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 勧 (すすめる、カン、ケン советовать), 罵 (ののしる、バ ругать, бранить)
Ru_Radicals: 广 (скала с точкой), 艾 (мокса), 杰
Ru_trainchinese: jiàn: (графема) рекомендовать; (книжн.) жертвовать; (книжн.) соломенный матрас, солома
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if the fire (灬) reaches (丂) the grass (艹) on the western (覀) stony cliff (广) it is recommended (to move ...)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I recommend you put a deposit on these Valentine's Day flowers now as they will sell out quickly later.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from "茻", "廌" also sounds. "廌" is like a wild beast, and the whole word is like a wild beast eating grass. "Said Wen": "Recommend, where the beast eats. From the divine to the Yellow Emperor, the emperor said: Where to eat? Said: Food recommended, water in summer, pine and cypress in winter." "Zhuangzi. "Qiwu Lun": "The people's food is low-end, the elk eats recommendation", which means that people eat meat and elk eat grass (Chen Guying). Later it was extended as a mat, and it was also used as a contribution and a gift.

The inscriptions on gold mean admiration, and Chen Houyin [the following month] Dun: "Zhe (zhu) princes [yin pan] recommend auspicious gold", which means princes respectfully offer hard bronze. " Recommendation " means that no prey or livestock are used in the sacrifice, but food in the season is used for sacrifice, which is extended to enter the sacrifice. Wu Wangguangjian: "Recommendation", "Recommendation" is the big basin used in the service. There are ancient writing data "Ge Jian", "Jian Jian", "Ding Jian" and other names from bronze, or written "Jin Ho" (Shan Dong), " recommended ", " Jin " nearly all the sound and meaning.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period indicate the mat, "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Zigao" Jane 12: "Sentence (Hou) the mother of the grass... winter sees the grass, I recommend it", which means that Hou Ji's mother sees the grass grows in the winter, picks the grass to sit on the cushion (Ji Xusheng ). "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jane 10: "Recommend to cover", which means to be used to cover grain and grass. It also expresses the contribution, "Xin Cai Chujian" A three slip 256: "We (enjoy) recommendation", that is, sacrifice and contribution.

Han silk book expressed recommendation, "Mawangdui. The 50th line of "Chun Qiu Shi Yu": "Qida does not see recommendations", which means that no one recommends with words when it is noble.
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from "茻", "廌" also sounds. "廌" is like a wild beast, and the whole word is like a wild beast eating grass.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「茻」，「廌」亦聲。「廌」象野獸，全字象野獸在吃草，本義是牧草。《說文》：「薦，獸之所食艸。从廌从艸。古者神人以廌遺黃帝，帝曰：何食何處？曰：食薦，夏處水澤，冬處松柏。」《莊子．齊物論》：「民食芻豢，麋鹿食薦」，意謂人吃肉類，麋鹿吃草(陳鼓應)。後引申為墊席，又假借為進獻、送上。

　　金文表示進獻，陳侯因[次月]敦：「者(諸)侯[寅皿]薦吉金」，意謂諸侯恭敬地獻上堅硬的青銅。「薦」表示在祭祀中不用獵物、牲畜，而用合時節的糧食供奉，引申為進奉。吳王光鑑：「薦鑑」，「薦鑑」即進奉用的大盆。古文字資料中有「薦鬲」、「薦鑑」、「薦鼎」等銅器自名，或者寫成「晉鎬」（董珊），「薦」、「晉」音義皆近。

　　戰國竹簡表示墊，《上博竹書二．子羔》簡12：「句(后)稷之母……冬見芺，攼而薦之」，意謂后稷的母親冬天見到芺草長出來，採下芺草來墊坐着(季旭昇)。《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡10：「復以薦蓋」，意謂要用來墊蓋糧草。又表示進獻，《新蔡楚簡》甲三簡256：「亯(享)薦」，即祭享進獻。

　　漢帛書表示推薦，《馬王堆．春秋事語》第50行：「其達不見薦言」，意謂顯貴的時候沒有人用言詞推薦。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「茻」，「廌」亦聲。「廌」象野獸，全字象野獸在吃草，本義是牧草。

薦薦RS
荐荐 		offer, present, recommend
  • an elk 廌 in a park being offered grass 艹 by visitors
  • ⓢ talent 存 makes present from grass 艹 to be offered
(Simplified: 荐)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 廌 indicates the sound; 艹 (perennial grass) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 廌 [ zhì ] unicorn
①推舉，介紹：推薦。舉薦。薦擢。
②頻仍，屢次：薦仍(一再)。荐饑(連年饑荒)。薦食(一再吞食，喻不斷侵略)。荐臻(接連來到)。
③進獻，祭獻：薦羞(進獻餚饌)。薦新(以初熟穀物或時鮮果物祭獻)。薦胙(供獻鬼神的肉)。
④草：“麋鹿食薦”。
⑤草蓆，墊子：草荐。棕薦。
(Simplified: 荐)

推薦(すいせん): recommendation

金文從「 茻 」，「 廌 」亦聲。「 廌 」象野獸，全字象野獸在吃草，本義是牧草。《說文》：「薦，獸之所食艸。从廌从艸。古者神人以廌遺黃帝，帝曰：何食何處？曰：食薦，夏處水澤，冬處松柏。」《莊子．齊物論》：「民食芻豢，麋鹿食薦」，意謂人吃肉類，麋鹿吃草(陳鼓應)。後引申為墊席，又假借為進獻、送上。 金文表示進獻，陳侯因[次月]敦：「者(諸)侯[寅皿]薦吉金」，意謂諸侯恭敬地獻上堅硬的青銅。「 薦 」表示在祭祀中不用獵物、牲畜，而用合時節的糧食供奉，引申為進奉。吳王光鑑：「薦鑑」，「薦鑑」即進奉用的大盆。古文字資料中有「薦鬲」、「薦鑑」、「薦鼎」等銅器自名，或者寫成「晉鎬」（董珊），「 薦 」、「 晉 」音義皆近。 戰國竹簡表示墊，《上博竹書二．子羔》簡12：「句(后)稷之母……冬見芺，攼而薦之」，意謂后稷的母親冬天見到芺草長出來，採下芺草來墊坐着(季旭昇)。《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡10：「復以薦蓋」，意謂要用來墊蓋糧草。又表示進獻，《新蔡楚簡》甲三簡256：「亯(享)薦」，即祭享進獻。 漢帛書表示推薦，《馬王堆．春秋事語》第50行：「其達不見薦言」，意謂顯貴的時候沒有人用言詞推薦。
Bronze inscription from " 茻", " 廌" also sounds. " 廌" is like a wild beast, and the whole word is like a wild beast eating grass. "Said Wen": "Recommend, where the beast eats. From the divine to the Yellow Emperor, the emperor said: Where to eat? Said: Food recommended, water in summer, pine and cypress in winter." "Zhuangzi. "Qiwu Lun": "The people's food is low-end, the elk eats recommendation", which means that people eat meat and elk eat grass (Chen Guying). Later it was extended as a mat, and it was also used as a contribution and a gift. The inscriptions on gold mean admiration, and Chen Houyin [the following month] Dun: "Zhe (zhu) princes [yin pan] recommend auspicious gold", which means princes respectfully offer hard bronze. " Recommendation" means that no prey or livestock are used in the sacrifice, but food in the season is used for sacrifice, which is extended to enter the sacrifice. Wu Wangguangjian: "Recommendation", "Recommendation" is the big basin used in the service. There are ancient writing data "Ge Jian", "Jian Jian", "Ding Jian" and other names from bronze, or written "Jin Ho" (Shan Dong), " recommended", " Jin" nearly all the sound and meaning. The bamboo slips of the Warring States period indicate the mat, "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Zigao" Jane 12: "Sentence (Hou) the mother of the grass... winter sees the grass, I recommend it", which means that Hou Ji's mother sees the grass grows in the winter, picks the grass to sit on the cushion (Ji Xusheng ). "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jane 10: "Recommend to cover", which means to be used to cover grain and grass. It also expresses the contribution, "Xin Cai Chujian" A three slip 256: "We (enjoy) recommendation", that is, sacrifice and contribution. Han silk book expressed recommendation, "Mawangdui. The 50th line of "Chun Qiu Shi Yu": "Qida does not see recommendations", which means that no one recommends with words when it is noble.

薦字的基本解释

薦
jiàn
见“荐”。

薦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》作甸切，去霰，精。］
(1)牧草。
(2)草茂密丛聚。
(3)垫席；垫褥。
(4)衬，垫。
(5)包裹。
(6)进献；送上。
(7)祭祀时献牲。
(8)指祭品。
(9)指请和尚道士念经拜忏以超度亡灵。
(10)推荐；介绍。
(11)至；达到。
(12)铺陈。
(13)践踏。参见“薦撙”。
(14)执；举起。
(15)佐食。
(16)通“洊”。屡次；接连。
(17)通“搢”。插。
(18)通“栫”。堵塞。

薦字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薦； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1062第02
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】?作甸切，音?。【爾雅·釋草】薦，黍蓬。【疏】蒿也。【唐書·契苾何力傳】逐薦草美水以爲生。【說文】獸之所食草也。【莊子·齊物論】麋鹿食薦。【郭註】六畜所食曰薦。　又【韻會】進也。【易·豫卦】殷薦之上帝。【周禮·籩人】薦羞之實。【註】未食未飮曰薦，旣食旣飮曰羞。【穀梁傳註】無牲而祭曰薦。又【集韻】才甸切。通荐。【前漢·終軍傳】隨畜薦居。【師古註】薦讀曰荐。　又與縉通。【史記·五帝本紀】薦紳先生難言之。　又【揚子·方言】江淮家居?中謂之薦。【註】薦音荐。　又【字彙補】卽略切，音爵。【詩·大雅】?醢以薦。與臄、咢爲韻。　【集韻】或作?、?。?字原从稗作。

考證：〔【周禮·籩人】薦羞之事。〕　謹照原文事改實。〔【揚子·方言】江淮家?于中，謂之薦。【註】薦音符。〕　謹照原文?于改居?。符改荐。

暂无。

recommend
Basic explanation of words
recommend
jiàn
See "recommendation".
recommend
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guangyun" makes a cut, go to the chariot, fine. ]
(1) Pasture.
(2) The grass is densely clumped.
(3) Mats; mattresses.
(4) Lining, pad.
(5) Package.
(6) Make a contribution; send it on.
(7) Sacrifice sacrifices when offering sacrifices.
(8) Refers to sacrifices.
(9) Asking monks and Taoists to recite sutras and repent to save the dead.
(10) Recommendation; introduction.
(11) To; reach.
(12) Lay out.
(13) Trample. See "Recommendation".
(14) Hold; lift up.
(15) Food supplement.
(16) Through "洊". Repeatedly; successively.
(17) Through "搢". Plug in.
(18) Through "栫". Blocked.
recommend
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　 Recommend; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1062 No. 02
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Make a cut, sound?. 【Erya·Shucao】Recommended, Peng Peng. 【Sparse】Artemisia also. Name meaning

jiàn
вм. 荐
Radicals: 艹, 广, 覀, 鳥  (flowers, canopy, helicopter, bird)
Meaning Mnemonic
You want some flowers to put on the canopy above your helicopter to keep the birds away, so you ask people what they would recommend.
You've bought flowers before, but you really don't know which ones would work best to stop birds from landing on the canopy and pooping on your helicopter.
Reading Mnemonic
You ask for a recommendation from the centaur (せん) that owns the local flower shop. Now he's walking around your helicopter canopy and staring at the birds, nodding.
I hope the centaur recommends a cheap flower... but with your luck flowers that keep birds away will cost a fortune.
